languages.text: "Боюсь, не успеется, Лорд-капитан. Уже надо быть настороже — предательское отродье вот-вот покажет нос".
"I'm afraid we don't have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant — the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, не успеется, Лорд-капитан. Уже надо быть настороже — предательское отродье вот-вот покажет нос".

traits.locale_text: "I am afraid we do not have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant, the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."
"I am afraid we do not have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant, the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."
"I am afraid we do not have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant, for the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."
"I am afraid we do not have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant, for the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."
"I'm afraid we don't have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant — the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."
"I'm afraid we don't have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant — the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, wir haben keine Zeit, Lord Captain. Wir müssen wachsam sein – der Verräterabschaum wird sich gleich offenbaren."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid we don't have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant — the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, wir haben keine Zeit, Lord Captain. Wir müssen wachsam sein – der Verräterabschaum wird sich gleich offenbaren."

languages.text: «Me temo que no tenemos tiempo, Lord Capitán. Hemos de estar alerta; esa escoria traicionera está a punto de revelar su presencia».
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid we don't have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant — the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que no tenemos tiempo, Lord Capitán. Hemos de estar alerta; esa escoria traicionera está a punto de revelar su presencia».

languages.text: 「残念ですが時間がありません、ロード・キャプテン。ご用心を。裏切り者のクズが姿を現そうとしています」
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid we don't have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant — the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ですが時間がありません、ロード・キャプテン。ご用心を。裏切り者のクズが姿を現そうとしています」

languages.text: “恐怕没时间讲别的故事了，舰长大人。我们必须保持警惕，那个奸诈的人渣马上就要露面了。”
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid we don't have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant — the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕没时间讲别的故事了，舰长大人。我们必须保持警惕，那个奸诈的人渣马上就要露面了。”

languages.text: « Je crains que nous n'en ayons pas le temps, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous devons rester vigilants. Ce maudit traître ne tardera pas à se montrer. »
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid we don't have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant — the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que nous n'en ayons pas le temps, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous devons rester vigilants. Ce maudit traître ne tardera pas à se montrer. »

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki vaktimiz yok Lord Kaptan. Tetikte olmalıyız. Hain pislik, kendini ele vermek üzere."
languages.original_text: "I'm afraid we don't have time, Lord Captain. We must be vigilant — the treacherous scum is about to reveal himself."
